entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a wizard who is trying to get back down to the hospital wing without being seen.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts and one of Harry's friends, she is tugging at his sleeve and trying to hurry him along.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, he is mentioned as someone who will lock the door if they don't get back down to the hospital wing in time.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: A Ministry of Magic official, he is walking along the corridor with Snape and discussing the Black affair.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: The potions master at Hogwarts, he is talking to Fudge about the Kiss and the dementors.

entities.name: macnair
entities.description: A Ministry of Magic official who is returning with the dementors.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Someone who has been involved in an affair that Fudge and Snape are discussing.

relationships.description: Harry is accompanied by Hermione as they try to get back down to the hospital wing without being seen.
Fudge and Snape are walking along the corridor together and discussing the Kiss and the dementors.
Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who will lock the door if Harry doesn't get back down to the hospital wing in time.
